Verses: 1 silanaatkalukkuppinbu Avar Marupadiyum Kapparnagoomukkup Ponaar; Avar Veettilirukkiraar Endru Janangal Kelvippattu;
2 udane Vaasalukku Munnum Nirka Idampodhaadhapadikku Anegar Koodivandhaargal; Avargalukku Vasanaththaip Podhiththaar.
3 appozhudhu Naaluper Oru Thimirvaadhakkaaranai Sumandhukondu Avaridaththil Vandhaargal;
4 janakkoottaththinimiththam Avarukku Sameebamaai Serakkoodaamal, Avar Irundha Veettin Merkooraiyaip Piriththuth Thirappaakki, Thimirvaadhakkaaran Kidakkira Padukkaiyai Irakkinaargal.
5 yesu Avargal Visuvaasaththaik Kandu, Thimirvaadhakkaaranai Nokki: Magane, Un Paavangal Unakku Mannikkappattadhu Endraar.
6 ange Utkaarndhirundha Vedhapaaragaril Silar:
7 ivan Ippadi Dhevadhooshanam Sollugiradhenna? Dhevan Oruvareyandrip Paavangalai Mannikkaththakkavar Yaar Endru Thangal Irudhayangalil Sindhiththukkondirundhaargal.
8 avargal Thangalukkulle Ippadi Sindhikkiraargalendru Yesu Udane Thammudaiya Aaviyil Arindhu, Avargalai Nokki: Neengal Ungal Irudhayangalil Ippadi Sindhikkiradhenna?
9 un Paavangal Unakku Mannikkappattadhendru Solvadho, Ezhundhu Un Padukkaiyai Eduththukkondu Nadavendru Solvadho, Edhu Elidhu?
10 boomiyile Paavangalai Mannikka Manushakumaaranukku Adhigaaram Undenbadhai Neengal Ariyavendum Endru Solli Thimirvaadhakkaaranai Nokki:
11 nee Ezhundhu, Un Padukkaiyai Eduththukkondu, Un Veettukkup Po Endru Unakku Sollugiren Endraar.

12 udane, Avan Ezhundhu, Than Padukkaiyai Eduththukkondu Ellaarukkumunbaagap Ponaan. Appozhudhu Ellaarum Aachchariyappattu: Naam Orukkaalum Ippadik Kandadhillaiyendru Solli, Dhevanai Magimaippaduththinaargal.
13 avar Marupadiyum Purappattuk Kadalaruge Ponaar; Appozhudhu Janangalellaarum Avaridaththil Vandhaargal; Avargalukkup Podhagampanninaar.
14 avar Nadandhupogaiyil, Alpeyuvin Kumaaranaagiya Levi Aayaththuraiyil Utkaarndhirukkiradhaik Kandu; Enakkup Pinsendruvaa Endraar; Avan Ezhundhu Avarukkup Pinsendraan.
15 appozhudhu, Avanudaiya Veettile Avar Pojanapandhiyirukkaiyil, Anega Aayakkaararum Paavigalum Avarodukooda Vandhirundhapadiyaal, Avargalum Yesuvodum Avar Seesharodungoodap Pandhiyirundhaargal.

16 avar Aayakkaararodum Paavigalodum Pojanampannugiradhai Vedhapaaragarum Pariseyarum Kandu, Avarudaiya Seesharai Nokki: Avar Aayakkaararodum Paavigalodum Pojanapaanam Pannugiradhennavendru Kettaargal.
17 yesu Adhai Kettu: Piniyaaligalukku Vaiththiyan Vendiyadheyallaamal Sugamullavargalukku Vendiyadhillai; Needhimaangalaiyalla, Paavigalaiye Manandhirumpugiradharku Azhaikkavandhen Endraar.

18 yovaanudaiya Seesharum Pariseyarudaiya Seesharum Ubavaasam Pannivandhaargal. Avargal Avaridaththil Vandhu: Yovaanudaiya Seesharum Pariseyarudaiya Seesharum Ubavaasikkiraargale, Ummudaiya Seeshar Ubavaasiyaamaliruppadhennavendru Kettaargal.
19 adharku Yesu: Manavaalan Thangalodirukkaiyil Manavaalanudaiya Thozhar Ubavaasippaargalaa? Manavaalan Thangaludane Irukkumvaraikkum Ubavaasikkamaattaargale.
20 manavaalan Avargalai Vittu Edupadum Naatkal Varum, Andha Naatkalile Ubavaasippaargal.
21 oruvanum Kodiththundaip Pazhaiya Vasthiraththodu Inaikkamaattaan, Inaiththaal, Adhinode Inaiththa Pudhiyathundu Pazhaiyadhai Adhigamaaik Kizhikkum, Peeralum Adhigamaagum.

22 oruvanum Pudhu Thiraatcharasaththaip Pazhanthuruththigalil Vaarththuvaikkamaattaan; Vaarththuvaiththaal, Pudhurasam Thuruththigalaik Kizhiththuppodum, Rasamum Sindhippom; Thuruththigalum Kettuppom; Pudhurasaththaip Pudhu Thuruththigalil Vaarththuvaikkavendum Endraar.
23 pinbu, Avar Oivunaalil Payir Vazhiye Ponaar; Avarudaiya Seeshargal Kooda Nadandhupogaiyil, Kadhirkalaik Koiyath Thodanginaargal.
24 pariseyar Avarai Nokki: Idho, Oivunaalil Seyyaththagaadhadhai Ivargal En Seygiraargal Endraargal.
25 adharku Avar: Thaaveedhukku Undaana Aapaththil, Thaanum Thannodirundhavargalum Pasiyaayirundhapodhu,

26 avan Abiyaththaar Ennum Piradhaana Aasaariyan Kaalaththil Seydhadhai Neengal Orukkaalum Vaasikkavillaiyaa? Avan Dhevanudaiya Veettil Piravesiththu, Aasaariyarthavira Veroruvarum Pusikkaththagaatha Theyvasamugaththu Appangalaith Thaanum Pusiththuth Thannodirundhavargalukkum Koduththaane Endraar.
27 pinbu Avargalai Nokki: Manushan Oivunaalukkaaga Undaakkappadavillai, Oivunaal Manushanukkaaga Undaakkappattadhu;
28 aagaiyaal Manushakumaaran Oivu Naalukkum Aandavaraai Irukkiraar Endraar.
